item.title: Atus Time Use Survey Analysis
item.description: Intro & Background This survey was created to test our cohort’s strengths in data visualization, data wrangling and data tidying. The American Time Use Survey is a public survey which enlists how Americans use their time in liesure, work and extra curricular activities. This data can be used in a variety of cross analysis’ and formats for companies within and outside of the United States. Data The American Time Use Survey (ATUS) is a time-use survey of Americans, which is sponsored by the Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS) and conducted by the U.
